sense.name: add or change colors
sense.examples: How does a toymaker color his toys? Can the fallout from a meteor explosion color the rain? The child colored the cat purple. Fall colored the trees. Your test is to name and color in all the countries on the map. A red shirt in my laundry colored all my whites pink.

sense.name: modify or bias
sense.examples: My prejudices always color my judgement. Don't let his foul mouth color your opion of him. Donnie's past experiences color his social interactions

sense.name: give a deceptive explanation or excuse for
sense.examples: She really knows how to color her lies.
